text:
1. Transportation is actively sought after by all passengers. All passengers want to travel when they do war k.
2. Passengers do not care about the route but their destination is important.
3. The passengers are shared between multiple service lines, in which different services are provided.
4. Strongly disagree: In case of no agreement the passengers strongly disagree among them selves.
5. Unanimous agree: All passengers have the same strong opinion on a certain topic.
